Html:
I noticed the home page for this project still has the following note at the bottom.

Note: This project is based on the pre-release Razor codebase and is subject to change.

 

Is this still the case, or is version 2.0 working of the official Razor RTW?

Hi,

v2 is indeed using the RTM (RTW) of the Razor codebase.  There will be some updated to this codeplex project site over the coming days to introduce some of the new features. Thanks :)
